dc_creator_sm: Federal Aviation Administration (Aeronautical Information Services, ATA-100)
dc_description_s: The Public Use Airport Runways database is a geographic dataset of runways in the United States and US territories containing information on the physical characteristics of the runways. The 5045 runways in the dataset are runways associated with the 20074 airports in the companion airport data set.  This geospatial data is derived from the FAA's National Airspace System Resource Aeronautical Data Product (Effective 23 January 2003).
